q: .`` There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do,'' he said. All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. But with all of the cable channels and talk radio and blogs, especially blogs, where people can be anonymous with their nastiness, I think has caused a level of coarseness in our society that we've all got to think about. Colin Powell said he thought Barack Obama was making an effort to reach across political divides to tone down the rhetoric and urged members of Congress to do the same.

Allen Iverson 's Žydrūnas Ilgauskasgest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the Jimmy Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

a management restructure involving long-time chief executive Eric Schmidt becoming executive chairman. Eric Schmidt , who has led Google since 2001, will take on the new role on April 4, working mostly on external operations, including deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership . As Google's new chief executive, Larry Page will lead product development and technology strategy, along with all day-to-day operations of the firm. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
